channel.title: I need an expert portforwarder to help me with my router. O.o Please. Help. Me
channel.description:
I have RoadRunner internet by Time Warner Cable, I access my gateway settings by typing my IP address into my address bar. I allow the port to be opened.
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/6y2moi.jpg[/img]
I created an exception in my firewall.
And when I go to check if the port is open, I still get this.
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/5cf5e8.jpg[/img]
I was able to access my server locally with 127.0.0.1 last night but I cannot now, I don't know why. Any help with either issue is appreciated. Thank you, Dylan
EDIT: I found out why I couldn't log on on my server offline but I still need help portforwarding my router. :s

item.title: I need an expert portforwarder to help me with my router. O.o Please. Help. Me

item.description:
@Army123 wrote:

i dont know how to manually portforward but i perfered using utorrent. as i see in this tutorial http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ug1muF_VUVw
hope this helps
